text: (Nushi kara) hitotsu no shirushi ga kare-ra ni yattekureba,`arra no shito-tachi ni atae rareta yona mono ga, watashi-tachi ni kudaru made wa shinjinaidearou.' To iu. Arra wa doko de (mata ikaga ni) kare no shimei o hatasubeki ka o, mottomo yoku shitte ora reru. Yagate tsumibukaimono wa, sono (shidekashita) subete no sakubo ni taishite, arra no omoto de kutsujoku to tsuretsuna kei o ukerudearou
